channel.title: No Live Mode Grub entry included in ISO?
channel.description:
So I downloaded the Kicksecure Xfce ISO, verified it and verified it after flashing to USB. When booting up the USB there is no *"LIVE mode USER (for daily activies.)"* option in GRUB.
Why is there not Live Mode included in the Kicksecure Live ISO and Installer?

item.title: No Live Mode Grub entry included in ISO?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Because an ISO is always in Iso Live Mode therefore always live by default anyhow.

Documented here. Quote Live Mode for Kicksecure

Live mode is accomplished by use of either,

  • A) ISO Live Mode (see USB Installation); or

Read full topic
item.source: No Live Mode Grub entry included in ISO?
